javadoc.name: LinkLocalServiceImpl
javadoc.comment:
The implementation of the link local service.

All custom service methods should be put in this class. Whenever methods are added, rerun ServiceBuilder to copy their definitions into the {@link com.liferay.linkshortener.service.LinkLocalService} interface.

This is a local service. Methods of this service will not have security checks based on the propagated JAAS credentials because this service can only be accessed from within the same VM.
javadoc.author: Miroslav Ligas

method.name: addLinkWithCheck
method.comment: Method checks if the short link is already used. If the link is used an Exception will be thrown. If the link is unused the original link will be checked if it is already in the database. If the link is found, it will be returned otherwise a new link will be stored to database and all appropriate model listeners will be notified.

throws.name: com.liferay.linkshortener.ShortLinkTakenException
throws.comment: if the short link is already taken

method.name: deleteOldRecords
method.comment: Deletes all the Links that were not modified after the specified date.

method.name: getLinksByAutoGen
method.comment: Method loads links auto-generated or explicitly created links from database. Method supports paging.

param.name: autoGen
param.comment: specifies what kind of links should be loaded

param.name: start
param.comment: the lower bound of the range of links

param.name: end
param.comment: the upper bound of the range of links (not inclusive)

method.name: getLinksByShortLink
method.comment: Method returns the link which short link matches the provided value.

throws.name: com.liferay.linkshortener.NoSuchLinkException
throws.comment: if a matching link could not be found

method.name: linkFactory
method.comment: Factory method for a new Link object.

method.name: updateLinkWithCheck
method.comment: Method checks if the short link is already taken if it was modified. If the link is free it updates the entry. Also notifies the appropriate model listeners.

javadoc.name: LinkServiceImpl
javadoc.comment:
The implementation of the link remote service.

All custom service methods should be put in this class. Whenever methods are added, rerun ServiceBuilder to copy their definitions into the {@link com.liferay.linkshortener.service.LinkService} interface.

This is a remote service. Methods of this service are expected to have security checks based on the propagated JAAS credentials because this service can be accessed remotely.
javadoc.author: Brian Wing Shun Chan

method.name: addLink
method.comment: Method checks if the short link is already used. If the link is used an Exception will be thrown. If the link is unused the original link will be checked if it is already in the database. If the link is found, it will be returned otherwise a new link will be stored to database and all appropriate model listeners will be notified.

throws.name: com.liferay.linkshortener.ShortLinkTakenException
throws.comment: if the short link is already taken

method.name: deleteLink
method.comment: Deletes the link with the primary key from the database. Also notifies the appropriate model listeners.

param.name: linkId
param.comment: the primary key of the link

throws.name: PortalException
throws.comment: if a link with the primary key could not be found

method.name: getLink
method.comment: Returns the link with the primary key.

param.name: linkId
param.comment: the primary key of the link

throws.name: PortalException
throws.comment: if a link with the primary key could not be found

method.name: getLinksByAutoGen
method.comment: Method loads links auto-generated or explicitly created links from database. Method supports paging.

param.name: autoGen
param.comment: specifies what kind of links should be loaded

param.name: start
param.comment: the lower bound of the range of links

param.name: end
param.comment: the upper bound of the range of links (not inclusive)

method.name: getLinksByShortLink
method.comment: Method returns the link which short link matches the provided value.

throws.name: com.liferay.linkshortener.NoSuchLinkException
throws.comment: if a matching link could not be found

method.name: linkFactory
method.comment: Factory method for a new Link object.

method.name: updateLink
method.comment: Method checks if the short link is already taken if it was modified. If the link is free it updates the entry. Also notifies the appropriate model listeners.
